item.description:
Since this meeting is after-hours, we are free to use the Library's parking lot. Our meeting room is downstairs and to the right.

The agenda will include:
1. Attendance sign-in and new member introductions.
2. Continue with the review of our trade experiment, and begin to look at how we might improve our trasding plans.
3. Suggestion period - quick review of the facilities and a vote on whether or not to continue meeting here or look for another venue, topics of interest for review and discussion, potential speakers, educational issues, other ideas, etc.
4. Have a group photo taken (assuming all are present).
5. Adjourn.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum October Meetup
